name: Gone_Clubbin'
description: A golf game in a vein similar to angry birds, where you aim and charge a varying amount of powered balls to destroy enemies and complete objectives. However, enemies are varied in behavior, and may require out of the box thinking to destroy them all. Just as well, rather than being in a fixed place, the player has a form of traversal, allowing new angles when dealing with levels. All wrapped up in an apocalypse flavored package.
